body.p: There is now confined in the State prison a young man by the name of Robert Smiley for killing James Boudinot (tried and convicted in the County of Carroll) We understand that the condition of the young man is such as to render him incompetent to perform labor and being acquainted with the case as presented to the Court & Jury we ask from motives of kindness to his family that your Excellency pardon the young man & release him from confinement we believe it will meet with the approval of the best citizens here --

Samuel Sanders J
Ellis
W. H. Tandy
Smith Wingate
Richd W, Sebree
Jesse Lundson
D. P. Craig
D M ONeal
Scott Lundy
R Sandford
W H Jones
C W Y Sliter

Carroll Cir Ct
Robt Smiley
Manslaughter
10 yrs Penty
Pardon Issd Aug 11 1862
